content.question: public static void sort(String[] arr) { for (int pass = arr.length - 1; pass >= 1; pass--) { String large = arr[0]; int index = 0; for (int k = 0; k <= pass; k++) { if ((arr[k].compareTo(large)) > 0) { large = arr[k]; index = k; } } arr[index] = arr[pass]; arr[pass] = large; } } Assume arr is the following array. "Ann" "Mike" "Walt" "Lisa" "Shari" "Jose" "Mary" “Bill” What is the intermediate value of arr after two iterations of the outer for loop in the call sort(arr)?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
